diseases.name: 21-hydroxylase-deficient congenital adrenal hyperplasia
diseases.description: Characterized by impaired lung and digestive function due to thick, sticky mucus. The disease typically worsens over time and currently has no cure.

diseases.name: ABCC8-related hyperinsulinism
diseases.description: Complete hearing loss from birth, problems with balance and progressive loss of sight starting before puberty.

diseases.name: Alpha-mannosidosis
diseases.description: Hearing loss that varies from mild to profound, is typically present at birth, and does not worsen over time.

diseases.name: Alpha-thalassemia
diseases.description: Sweet smelling urine, poor feeding, vomiting, lack of energy, and developmental delay.

diseases.name: Ataxia-telangiectasia
diseases.description: Loss of motor skills, seizures, vision and hearling loss, intellectual disability, and/or paralysis

diseases.name: Autosomal recessive polycystic kidney disease
diseases.description: Loss of motor skills, seizures, vision and hearling loss, intellectual disability, and/or paralysis

diseases.name: Bardet-Beidl syndrome, BBS1-related
diseases.description: Loss of motor skills, seizures, vision and hearling loss, intellectual disability, and/or paralysis

diseases.name: Cystic Fibrosis
diseases.description: Characterized by impaired lung and digestive function due to thick, sticky mucus. The disease typically worsens over time and currently has no cure.

diseases.name: Cystic Fibrosis
diseases.description: Characterized by impaired lung and digestive function due to thick, sticky mucus. The disease typically worsens over time and currently has no cure.

diseases.name: GJB2 Related hearing loss
diseases.description: Hearing loss that varies from mild to profound, is typically present at birth, and does not worsen over time.

diseases.name: Tay-Sachs Disease
diseases.description: Loss of motor skills, seizures, vision and hearling loss, intellectual disability, and/or paralysis.

diseases.name: Thalassemia
diseases.description: Excess fluid build up causes most babies with this condition to be stillborn or to die soon after birth.
